About Me

Hi, there! I am Yuxiang Ji (å§¬ç…œç¿”), a Ph.D. student in Xiamen University, supervised by Prof Liaoni Wu, and Prof Yancheng You. I am also currently a research intern at AMAP (Alibaba Group), where I work on MLLM agent reinforcement learning with Yong Wang and Xiangxiang Chu.

Previously, I worked as an AI engineer at Huawei Camera group. I obtained my Master degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from the University of Birmingham under the guidance of Prof Shuo Wang.

I am interested with multimodal research for UAVs and MLLM agent. Always happy to connect and collaborate on related research â€” feel free to reach out.
